content.text: {"translationLines":[{"lineNumber":85491,"originalJapaneseLine":"「お久しぶりです……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"It's been a while...\""},{"lineNumber":85492,"originalJapaneseLine":"「がははは、元気そうだな！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Gahaha, you look well!\""},{"lineNumber":85493,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ふふ、ランス殿も……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Hehe, Rance-dono as well...\""},{"lineNumber":85494,"originalJapaneseLine":"　その顔を見るとホッと安心します」","translatedEnglishLine":"When I see that face, I feel relieved.\""},{"lineNumber":85495,"originalJapaneseLine":"「おう、JAPANがピンチだと聞いて、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Oh, I heard JAPAN is in trouble,"},{"lineNumber":85496,"originalJapaneseLine":"　様子を見に来たぞ」","translatedEnglishLine":"so I came to check on things.\""},{"lineNumber":85497,"originalJapaneseLine":"「はい、ランス殿達が来られるという文を読み、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Yes, we read the message that Rance-dono and others would come,"},{"lineNumber":85498,"originalJapaneseLine":"　こちらでお待ちしておりました」","translatedEnglishLine":"and have been waiting here.\""},{"lineNumber":85499,"originalJapaneseLine":"「おっ、来た来たー」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Oh, here they come!\""},{"lineNumber":85500,"originalJapaneseLine":"「やっほー、折女ねーさんだよー。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Yahhoo! It's Sister Orihime."},{"lineNumber":85501,"originalJapaneseLine":"　覚えてる？」","translatedEnglishLine":"Do you remember me?\""},{"lineNumber":85502,"originalJapaneseLine":"「わあ、ランスさん、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Wow, Rance-san,"},{"lineNumber":85503,"originalJapaneseLine":"　本当に来てくれたんですね」","translatedEnglishLine":"you really came.\""},{"lineNumber":85504,"originalJapaneseLine":"「折女に野菊か。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Orihime and Nogiku, huh."},{"lineNumber":85505,"originalJapaneseLine":"　懐かしい顔ぶれだな」","translatedEnglishLine":"Nostalgic faces.\""},{"lineNumber":85506,"originalJapaneseLine":"「って、あん？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Huh?\""},{"lineNumber":85507,"originalJapaneseLine":"「…………」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"........\""},{"lineNumber":85508,"originalJapaneseLine":"「なんだ、ノワール、そんな遠いところで。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Hey, Noir, you're way over there."},{"lineNumber":85509,"originalJapaneseLine":"　お前もこっち来い来ーい」","translatedEnglishLine":"Come over here too!\""},{"lineNumber":85510,"originalJapaneseLine":"「……ぷいっ」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"...Pui.\""},{"lineNumber":85511,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あっ、行っちゃいました……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ah, she went away...\""},{"lineNumber":85512,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あいつは相変わらずだな」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"She's the same as always.\""},{"lineNumber":85513,"originalJapaneseLine":"「…………」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"........\""},{"lineNumber":85514,"originalJapaneseLine":"「おーっ、お町さんではないか！","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Oh, isn't that Omachi-san!"},{"lineNumber":85515,"originalJapaneseLine":"　相変わらずでかい乳！」","translatedEnglishLine":"Still got those huge breasts!\""},{"lineNumber":85516,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ランス、来てくれたか。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Rance, you came."},{"lineNumber":85517,"originalJapaneseLine":"　待っていたぞ」","translatedEnglishLine":"I've been waiting.\""},{"lineNumber":85518,"originalJapaneseLine":"「と、ついでの目玉」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"And, an added bonus.\""},{"lineNumber":85519,"originalJapaneseLine":"「なんだ、俺はついでか」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"What, I'm just an extra?\""},{"lineNumber":85520,"originalJapaneseLine":"妖怪王政宗はランスの軽口を","translatedEnglishLine":"The Youkai King Masamune accepted Rance's teasing words"},{"lineNumber":85521,"originalJapaneseLine":"どこか嬉しそうに受け止めた。","translatedEnglishLine":"somehow happily."},{"lineNumber":85522,"originalJapaneseLine":"「……香様」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"...Lady Kaori.\""},{"lineNumber":85523,"originalJapaneseLine":"「留守を任されたにも関わらず、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Even though you were entrusted with the watch,"},{"lineNumber":85524,"originalJapaneseLine":"　この失態、言葉もない」","translatedEnglishLine":"this failure leaves me speechless.\""},{"lineNumber":85525,"originalJapaneseLine":"「いえ、これまで政宗様には、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"No, Masamune-sama has fought a lot until now."},{"lineNumber":85526,"originalJapaneseLine":"　沢山戦って頂きました。","translatedEnglishLine":"We are grateful."},{"lineNumber":85527,"originalJapaneseLine":"　感謝の念こそあれ責めるつもりなんて……」","translatedEnglishLine":"I feel gratitude, not blame...\""},{"lineNumber":85528,"originalJapaneseLine":"「どうか、顔をお上げ下さい」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Please, lift your head.\""},{"lineNumber":85529,"originalJapaneseLine":"「そう言って頂けると」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Hearing that,"},{"lineNumber":85530,"originalJapaneseLine":"政宗の謝罪が終わったのを見計らい、","translatedEnglishLine":"waiting for Masamune's apology to finish,"},{"lineNumber":85531,"originalJapaneseLine":"五十六がことさらに声を弾ませる。","translatedEnglishLine":"I-ju-roku spoke with intentionally cheerful voice."},{"lineNumber":85532,"originalJapaneseLine":"「さあ、こんな所で立ち話もないものです。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Now, there's no need to stand and talk here."},{"lineNumber":85533,"originalJapaneseLine":"　中に入って下さい。お茶を淹れましょう」","translatedEnglishLine":"Please come inside. I'll brew some tea.\""},{"lineNumber":85534,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ああ、そうだな。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ah, yes."},{"lineNumber":85535,"originalJapaneseLine":"　今のJAPANの詳しい話も聞いてもらいたい」","translatedEnglishLine":"I want you to hear the detailed situation of JAPAN right now.\""},{"lineNumber":85536,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ふーむ……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Hmm...\""},{"lineNumber":85537,"originalJapaneseLine":"「どうかしましたか？　ランス兄様」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Is something wrong? Brother Rance.\""},{"lineNumber":85538,"originalJapaneseLine":"「織田城、織田城……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Oda Castle, Oda Castle..."},{"lineNumber":85539,"originalJapaneseLine":"　うーむ、何度見ても織田城だ」","translatedEnglishLine":"Hmm, no matter how many times I look, it's Oda Castle.\""},{"lineNumber":85540,"originalJapaneseLine":"「そうですねぇ。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"That's right...\""}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: その顔を見るとホッと安心します」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: When I see that face, I feel relieved."
"Oh, I heard JAPAN is in trouble,
so I came to check on things."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「はい、ランス殿達が来られるという文を読み、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Yes, we read the message that Rance-dono and others would come,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: こちらでお待ちしておりました」
「やっほー、折女ねーさんだよー。
本当に来てくれたんですね」
「なんだ、ノワール、そんな遠いところで。
お前もこっち来い来ーい」
「おーっ、お町さんではないか！
妖怪王政宗はランスの軽口を
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The Youkai King Masamune accepted Rance's teasing words

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: どこか嬉しそうに受け止めた。
「留守を任されたにも関わらず、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Even though you were entrusted with the watch,
"No, Masamune-sama has fought a lot until now.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 沢山戦って頂きました。
感謝の念こそあれ責めるつもりなんて……」
政宗の謝罪が終わったのを見計らい、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: waiting for Masamune's apology to finish,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 五十六がことさらに声を弾ませる。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I-ju-roku spoke with intentionally cheerful voice.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「さあ、こんな所で立ち話もないものです。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Now, there's no need to stand and talk here.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 中に入って下さい。お茶を淹れましょう」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Please come inside. I'll brew some tea."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 今のJAPANの詳しい話も聞いてもらいたい」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I want you to hear the detailed situation of JAPAN right now."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「どうかしましたか？　ランス兄様」
うーむ、何度見ても織田城だ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Hmm, no matter how many times I look, it's Oda Castle."

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English
